image_generator.default_prompt: Serene mountain landscape with vibrant sunset colors

description_generator.prompt_template: Create an engaging Instagram caption for an image. The image was generated with the prompt: '{image_prompt}'. The image shows {image_description}. Start with '{opener}' and end with '{closer}'. Make the caption compelling and around 100-150 words. Include emotional elements and make it relatable for an Instagram audience.
